snippet: Federal authorities had accused Artist Arena, the operator of Web sites for stars like Justin Bieber and Selena Gomez, of illegally collecting information on thousands of children.
abstract: Artist Arena, operator of fan Web sites for pop stars like Justin Bieber and Selena Gomez, agrees to pay $1 million civil penalty to settle Federal Trade Commission charges that their sites illegally collected personal information about thousands of children.
lead_paragraph: Federal authorities had accused Artist Arena, the operator of Web sites for stars like Justin Bieber and Selena Gomez, of illegally collecting information on thousands of children.

headline.main: Fan Sites Settle Children’s Privacy Charges
headline.print_headline: Fan Sites for Pop Stars Settle F.T.C. Charges Over Children’s Privacy
